item.title: DOOM Emacs Config
item.description: About this Config Here is some help from the default config.el that I haven’t found a better spot for yet. Here are some additional functions/macros that could help you configure Doom: `load!’ for loading external *.el files relative to this one `use-package!’ for configuring packages `after!’ for running code after a package has loaded `add-load-path!’ for adding directories to the `load-path’, relative to this file. Emacs searches the `load-path’ when you load packages with `require’ or `use-package'.
